title: How To Install Drip Irrigation DIY Drip Irrigation Drip Irrigation Basics

tasks.task: Setting up drip irrigation for a garden.
subtasks: Purchasing half inch poly pipe from Home Depot or Lowe's.
Attaching a water timer to the faucet.
Connecting the half inch pipe to a backflow preventer.
Embedding the half inch line underground.
Attaching emitters spaced every four inches.
Extending the system to various plants using barbs and extensions.
Installing goof plugs for easy maintenance.
Connecting blueberry bushes and flower beds to the system.
Setting the water timer duration and timing.
Observing the drip emitters in action.
Adjusting the system as needed during the growing season.
